duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for ensuring the injection molding machine, tooling, materials, and equipment are operating at maximum efficiency and with zero defects.
Performing mold changes and set up all auxiliary equipment for new production runs.
Drive the reduction of scrap through elimination of mold conditions using corrective action and mold repair items.
Responsible for the accurate completion of Process Verification and Master Set-up Sheets.
Ensure machines and robots are running at optimum efficiency and troubleshoot machine, mold, and material issues.
Follow all OSHA and safety rules and regulations during work.
Achieve the minimum possible mold change/set-up time and maintain machine cleanliness.
Reading mold schedule and identification and problem solving ability.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years experience in plastics, mold set-ups, and troubleshooting injection molding. Robotics experience preferred. Working knowledge of plant machinery, electronics, hydraulics, and pneumatic preferred.
